name: MorNetwork
description: Main server for MorTorq web applications

scripts.updateall: git pull; npm install; cd ..; if [ ! -d 'morteam-server-website' ]; then git clone https://github.com/mortorqrobotics/morteam-server-website; fi; cd morteam-server-website; git pull; npm install; cd ..; if [ ! -d 'morteam-web' ]; then git clone https://github.com/mortorqrobotics/morteam-web; fi; cd morteam-web; git pull; npm install; npm run build

author: Benjamin Heller <benjaminheller99@gmail.com>
